import React from 'react' import Product from './Product1' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { addToCart } from "../Features/cartSlice"; export default function MensWear() { const items = useSelector((state) => state.allCart.items); const dispatch = useDispatch(); return ( <>
{items.map((item) => (

{item.id}

{item.title}

{item.description}

₹ {item.price}

)) }
) }
